Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury Prop. #1 --  1 Mill - PJ - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 years, 1 mill property tax renewal for maintaining and operating the public health unit in West Carroll Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $51,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the public health unit in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury Prop. #2 --  1/4% S&U Tax - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Sales & Use Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 1/4% sales and use tax renewal for providing a solid waste recycling program for the Parish, including paying the costs of constructing, acquiring, maintaining and/or operating facilities and equipment required in connection therewith, and to pay other costs of collecting and disposing solid waste for the West Carroll Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the authority of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect, and adopt an ordinance providing for the levy and collection, of a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $258,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) upon the sale at retail, the use, lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law, for a period of ten (10) years beginning July 1, 2011, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expense of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing a solid waste recycling program for the Parish, including paying the costs of constructing, acquiring, maintaining and/or operating facilities and equipment required in connection therewith, and to pay other costs of collecting and disposing solid waste for the Parish?
